attributes.action: Award Nigel Farage a knighthood for services to the country
attributes.background: Nigel Farage stands firmly on behalf of the British people despite constant ridicule and criticism. His unfaultering valour & commitment to the nation and it's people is worthy of recognition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
